query:
SELECT DISTINCT JB.JOB_ID, JB.JOB_NAME 
		FROM FA_OWNER.OUTPUT_PROFILE OP, FA_OWNER.OUTPUT_PROFILE_JOB_DTL OPJD, FA_OWNER.JOB JB
                WHERE OP.OUTPUT_PROFILE_ID = OPJD.OUTPUT_PROFILE_ID
                      AND OPJD.JOB_NAME        = JB.JOB_NAME
                      AND OP.REC_ACTIVE_IND = 'Y' AND PUBLISHED_IND = 'Y'  
                      AND OPJD.REC_ACTIVE_IND = 'Y'
                      AND JB.REC_ACTIVE_IND = 'Y' 
                      AND (to_date('${DEFAULT_BUSINESS_DATE}','YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN JB .EFF_DT AND JB .TERM_DT)
                      AND  (          JB .RUN_DAY IS NULL
                              OR (    JB .JOB_RUN_FREQ_CD = 2        AND     TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('${DEFAULT_BUSINESS_DATE}','YYYYMMDD'),'D') = JB .RUN_DAY )
                              OR (    JB .JOB_RUN_FREQ_CD = 3        AND     TO_CHAR(TO_DATE('${DEFAULT_BUSINESS_DATE}','YYYYMMDD'),'DD') = JB .RUN_DAY )
                            )
